measured_by: self-rated visual analog scale for compassion
justification: After the scenarios, “Participants were also asked to indicate how much compassion they felt … Both questions were answered using a visual-analog scale.”

measured_by: self-rated visual analog scale for effort
justification: The materials section states that participants “were asked to indicate … how effortful they felt responding to the questionnaire was. Both questions were answered using a visual-analog scale.”
“In the second wave of data collection, an additional 3-item standard Cognitive Reflection Test (Frederick, 2005) was added.”

measured_by: length of work experience at the Migration Agency
justification: The authors note that “while we did not directly measure compassion fatigue in our sample, we operationalize it through longer work experience at the Migration Agency.”
